thread.title: It's Officially Easier to Count the Marvel Characters Who Aren't in Infinity War
thread.title_full: It's Officially Easier to Count the Marvel Characters Who Aren't in Infinity War

author: Katharine Trendacosta
title: It's Officially Easier to Count the Marvel Characters Who Aren't in Infinity War
text:
Go to permalink Image: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol.2, Marvel/Disney 
There are characters from movies not even out yet who are being added to Avengers: Infinity War . At this point, if you are in the MCU and you havenâ€™t been asked to show up in Infinity War , I would really worry. Advertisement 
Pom Klementieff, who plays Mantis in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 , announced she would be in the new Avenger flick with some pictures posted to Instagram. A few days back, she teased with this one: 
And then, yesterday, she apparently confirmed her appearance with this one: 
And so the antennae-d telepath joins Thanos, Iron Man, the Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye, Star-Lord, Gamora, Groot, Drax, Scarlet Witch, Winter Soldier, Doctor Strange, Vision, Maria Hill, Nick Fury, Wong, Nebula, Loki, and, presumably, the kitchen sink as one of the characters making an appearance in Infinity War .
